nodes.text: S3-R9 was an R-series astromech droid manufactured by Industrial Automaton and owned by the Droid Depot in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. During the First Order's occupation of Batuu in 34 ABY, S3-R9 was displayed on a shelf of droid parts within the depot. It had silver and white paneling and a black sensor.
S3-R9 appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
